entities.name: PRODUCTIVITY AND BUSINESS PROCESSES
entities.description: A segment of the company that includes Office Commercial products, Office Consumer products, LinkedIn, and Dynamics products.

entities.name: INTELLIGENT CLOUD
entities.description: A segment of the company that includes Server products, cloud services, and Enterprise Services.

entities.name: MORE PERSONAL COMPUTING
entities.description: A segment of the company that includes Windows products, Gaming, and devices.

entities.name: OFFICE 365 COMMERCIAL
entities.description: A cloud-based subscription service that includes productivity tools and services for commercial use.

entities.name: MICROSOFT 365 CONSUMER
entities.description: A cloud-based subscription service that includes productivity tools and services for personal use.

entities.name: LINKEDIN
entities.description: A business and employment-oriented online service that operates via websites and mobile apps.

entities.name: DYNAMICS 365
entities.description: A suite of intelligent business applications that helps manage business operations.

entities.name: AZURE
entities.description: A cloud computing service created by Microsoft for building, testing, deploying, and managing applications and services.

entities.name: MICROSOFT 365
entities.description: A line of subscription services offered by Microsoft which includes Office 365, Windows 10 Enterprise, and Enterprise Mobility + Security.

entities.name: XBOX
entities.description: A gaming brand created and owned by Microsoft, which includes video game consoles, games, and services.

relationships.relationship_description: Office 365 Commercial is part of the Productivity and Business Processes segment.
Microsoft 365 Consumer is part of the Productivity and Business Processes segment.
LinkedIn is part of the Productivity and Business Processes segment.
Dynamics 365 is part of the Productivity and Business Processes segment.
Azure is part of the Intelligent Cloud segment.
Enterprise Services is part of the Intelligent Cloud segment.
Microsoft 365 is part of the More Personal Computing segment.
Xbox is part of the More Personal Computing segment.
